summary.para: Creates a font object that matches the properties specified by the LOGFONT structure.

param.name: logFont
param.para: Structure containing a GDI-compatible font description.

param.name: fontCollection
param.para: The font collection to search. If NULL, the local system font collection is used.

param.name: font
param.para: Receives a newly created font object if successful, or NULL in case of error.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Reads the font signature from the given font.

param.name: fontFace
param.para: Font to read font signature from.

param.name: fontSignature
param.para: Font signature from the OS/2 table, ulUnicodeRange, and ulCodePageRange.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Reads the font signature from the given font.

param.name: font
param.para: Font to read font signature from.

param.name: fontSignature
param.para: Font signature from the OS/2 table, ulUnicodeRange, and ulCodePageRange.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a list of matching fonts based on the specified LOGFONT values. Only fonts of that family name will be returned.

param.name: logFont
param.para: Structure containing a GDI-compatible font description.

param.name: filteredSet
param.para: >Receives the filtered font set if successful.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides interoperability with GDI, such as methods to convert a font face to a LOGFONT structure, or to convert a GDI font description into a font face. It is also used to create bitmap render target objects.
